mention.text: the men 's winner of Monday 's Boston Marathon.
Ingrid Kristiansen and Joan Benoit Samuelson
1988 Olympic champion Gelindo Bordin , who outsmarted the early pacesetters by running a patient , calculating race.
his third consecutive runner-up finish in Boston.
